ArmorPiercing.Title: Armor Piercing
ArmorPiercing.Description: Targeted damaged Bloon loses all Armor

Camo.Title: Camo
Camo.Description: Attackers must target non-Camo Bloons first

Defender.Title: Defender +{VALUE}
Defender.Description: Can defend on opponent's turn, has +{VALUE} damage on opponent's turn

Tank.Title: Tank {VALUE}
Tank.Description: Can protect your hero from incoming bloon attacks; has {VALUE} health and taunts attacking bloons over to it. Monkey is removed when out of health

Attacker.Title: Attacker {VALUE}, {VALUE2}, {VALUE3}
Attacker.Description: Can manually attack enemy Bloons; has {VALUE} ammo, {VALUE2} reload delay and deals {VALUE3} damage per shot

Focus.Title: Focus
Focus.Description: Can bypass Must Pop conditions normally

Doomed.Title: Doomed
Doomed.Description: This Monkey will be removed at the start of its next turn

Immobile.Title: Immobile
Immobile.Description: Cannot increase or decrease delay. Cannot attack

MustPop.Title: Must Pop
MustPop.Description: Monkey must attack this Bloon before others

OnDamaged.Title: On Damaged
OnDamaged.Description: Triggers on losing health from any source

OnDestroyed.Title: On Destroyed
OnDestroyed.Description: Triggers when Bloon is Popped (by damage or effect) or when it hits opposing Hero

OnFire.Title: On Fire
OnFire.Description: Will take 30 damage at the end of its turn and before attacking

OnNapalmFire.Title: On Napalm Fire
OnNapalmFire.Description: Will take 60 damage at the end of its turn and before attacking

OnLeak.Title: On Leak
OnLeak.Description: Triggers when a bloon attacks a hero (after defenders have acted)

OnPopped.Title: On Popped
OnPopped.Description: Triggers when Bloon is Popped (by damage or effect). Does not trigger if Bloon hits opposing Hero

OnBloonAttack.Title: On Bloon Attack
OnBloonAttack.Description: Triggers when a bloon is about to attack your hero

OnReplace.Title: On Replace
OnReplace.Description: Triggers when this Monkey is replaced by another Monkey

OnRemoved.Title: On Removed
OnRemoved.Description: Triggers when this Monkey is removed. Does not trigger if this Monkey was replaced by another Monkey

OnEmpty.Title: On Empty
OnEmpty.Description: Triggers when this Monkey has no ammo

OnOpponentsTurn.Title: On Opponent's Turn
OnOpponentsTurn.Description: Triggers when it's the opponent's turn

Pick.Title: Pick {VALUE}
Pick.Description: Look at the next {VALUE} cards in your deck. Choose one and add it to your hand. Other cards go to the bottom of your deck

Revive.Title: Revive
Revive.Description: When Destroyed, resummon this Bloon with current Delay and without Revive

Undead.Title: Undead
Undead.Description: When Destroyed, does not go to Graveyard

SplashDamage.Title: Splash Damage
SplashDamage.Description: Also deals damage to Bloons on either side of the target

Pierce.Title: Pierce {VALUE}
Pierce.Description: Deals equal damage to the next {VALUE} Bloons in line

Bounce.Title: Bounce {VALUE}, {VALUE2}
Bounce.Description: Deal {VALUE2} damage to a random other Bloon {VALUE} times

Shocked.Title: Shocked
Shocked.Description: Will take 20 damage at the end of its turn and before attacking; wears off after its delay is reduced once. Effect will persist on immobile targets

MegaShocked.Title: Mega Shocked
MegaShocked.Description: Will take 40 damage at the end of its turn and before attacking; wears off after its delay is reduced once. Effect will persist on immobile targets

Stunned.Title: Stunned
Stunned.Description: Monkey can't attack or reload until stun wears off. Bloon delay does not reduce at end of turn

Silenced.Title: Silenced
Silenced.Description: Silenced Monkeys or Bloons cannot attack until silence wears off

Paused.Title: Paused
Paused.Description: Monkey can't be targeted by Hero Abilities and Powers nor attack or reload until pause wears off. Bloon delay does not reduce at end of turn and cannot be damaged or targeted by Monkeys, Hero Abilities or Powers until pause wears off

Cocooned.Title: Cocooned
Cocooned.Description: Monkey or Bloon is contained and is unable to attack or change delay until cocoon breaks. Cocoon has 2x health equivalent to Bloon health or 4x health equivalent to Monkey ATK. Monkeys can attack this normally

Deactivated.Title: Deactivated
Deactivated.Description: Monkey or Bloon can't trigger any on keyword effects (e.g. **On Turn Start**) at the start of its next turn

Attached.Title: Attached
Attached.Description: Cannot attack normally whilst attached on top of a Monkey. Becomes unattached and returns to a free Monkey space whenever the Monkey it was attached to was removed

Temporary.Title: Temporary
Temporary.Description: Is removed at end of turn after ammo reaches 0

TemporaryAmmo.Title: Temporary Ammo
TemporaryAmmo.Description: Extra ammo that is removed at the start of the turn

Unique.Title: Unique
Unique.Description: You can only have one copy of this card

AcidPool.Title: Acid Pool
AcidPool.Description: Deals 30 damage to any Bloon ending its turn on it. Lasts 2 turns

StrongAcidPool.Title: Strong Acid Pool
StrongAcidPool.Description: Deals 50 damage to any Bloon ending its turn on it. Lasts 2 turns

Foam.Title: Foam
Foam.Description: Removes Camo and deactivates abilities to any Bloon ending its turn on it. Lasts 2 turns

ClusterBomb.Title: Cluster Bomb
ClusterBomb.Description: Deals 60 damage and 30 splash damage to any Bloon that is caught by it. Lasts 1 turn

UnstableConcoction.Title: Unstable Concoction
UnstableConcoction.Description: Coated Bloons that were popped will deal 100 splash damage. Wears off after 3 turns

HotDog.Title: Hot Dog
HotDog.Description: Any Bloon ending their turn on it gains **Revived** and is consumed

ZeroGold.Title: Zero Gold
ZeroGold.Description: Triggers an additional effect if you have 0 Gold

250Health.Title: 50% Health
250Health.Description: Triggers an additional effect if your Hero falls below 250 health

Enraged.Title: Enraged
Enraged.Description: Gains -1 reload delay and +10 ATK until enrage wears off
